articles.description: Watch Dogs: Legion is getting a new mission based on Money Heist, the popular Netflix show. Players can group up with their friends to rob crypto-currency in a special heist on the Bank of England.
articles.content: Steal some crypto for the resistance in Watch Dogs: Legion

articles.author: Joey Nolfi
articles.title: 'RuPaul's Drag Race' queen Gigi Goode comes out as trans-nonbinary - EW.com
articles.description: Budding supermodel who walked the runway for Rihanna comes out as a trans-nonbinary person who uses she/her pronouns.
articles.content:
RuPaul's Drag Race season 12 finalist Gigi Goode has come out as trans-nonbinary. 
The drag superstar and budding supermodel made the announcement Sunday on her Instagram, sharing a video she made w… [+3412 chars]
